compounddef.title: FFT kernels on real input values

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data for XPULPV2 extension.

detaileddescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data for XPULPV2 extension (parallel version).

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure

memberdef.argsstring: (const plp_fft_instance_f32 *S, const float32_t *__restrict__ pSrc, float32_t *__restrict__ pDst)
memberdef.name: plp_rfft_f32s_xpulpv2

briefdescription.para: Floating-point FFT on real input data for XPULPV2 extension.

parameterdescription.para: points to an instance of the floating-point FFT structure
points to the input buffer (real data)
points to the output buffer (complex data)

detaileddescription.para: These kernels calculate the FFT transform on real input data. If the dimension of input is FFTLen float32 numbers, the output buffer must contain at least (2*FFTLen) float32 values (used for intermediate computations). Due to the symmetry of real FFT only the first (FFTLen + 2) values of the result are computed in the last stage, corresponding to (FFTLen / 2 + 1) complex values. Supported algorithms: radix-2

These kernels calculate the FFT transform on real input data. If the dimension of input is FFTLen float32 numbers, the output buffer must contain at least (2*FFTLen) float32 values (used for intermediate computations). Due to the symmetry of real FFT only the first (FFTLen + 2) values of the result are computed in the last stage, corresponding to (FFTLen / 2 + 1) complex values. Supported algorithms: radix-2 radix-4 radix-8
